allow:
Bash(git commit -m "feat: change icon display setting to dropdown menu

- Add IconDisplayOption type with ''none'' | ''lucide'' | ''emoji'' options
- Update Settings.ts to use new enum type for showEmojiBeforeTabName
- Change ViewSettings UI from Toggle to Select component
- Update YearlyGlanceView and GlanceManagerView display logic
- Add migration logic for boolean to enum conversion
- Add i18n support for all three languages \(zh, en, zh-TW\)
- Update i18n types to include options structure")
